articles.title: ‘No legal obligation’ to bar Russian tycoon Alexey Mordashov’s yacht from entering local waters, says presidency - TimesLIVE
articles.description: As long as Russian tycoon Alexey Mordashov abides by South Africa’s immigration laws, no one has the right to prevent him from sailing his 141-metre luxury yacht into our local waters.
